name: wasm-flash
description: Example of flashing using a WebAssembly module
author: Rob Moran <github@thegecko.org>

scripts.emscripten: mkdir -p ./dist/wa && source ~/emsdk/emsdk_env.sh && emcc ./src/wa/flash.cpp -o ./dist/wa/flash.js --js-library ./src/wa/merge-into.js --post-js ./src/wa/post.js -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['ccall','UTF8ToString'] -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_NAME=flash -s ASYNCIFY=1 -s ASYNCIFY_IMPORTS=['logMessage','open','close','transferIn','transferOut']
